name: Astronautica
description:
You're lost in space. Go through the black holes and try to get back home. Help the young captain navigate space solving puzzles with your super 3D powers (made for #badboxart in 48h)

Explore 12 stages as you unleash the mighty powers of the 3D vision ( Warning: the game is not in 3D)

Controls:
Arrow Keys (move), Q and E (use skill), Enter (use chat) and R (reset).

A game by Ludipe with music by SilverCraft

Note: Screenshake is soft but if you need to disable it press 9
